design.custom_css: @font-face { font-family: 'AvenirLT-Book'; src: url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.woff') format('woff'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.ttf') format('truetype'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Book.svg#AvenirLT-Book') format('svg'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'AvenirLT-Black'; src: url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.woff') format('woff'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.ttf') format('truetype'), url('https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/AvenirLT-Black.svg#AvenirLT-Black') format('svg'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } * { border: none!important; } ion-title { position: relative; } ion-header { background: url() bottom/cover; } .bar-button{ display:none; } ion-header { height: 0vh; } ion-content.content { margin-top: 0vh!important; height: 100vh; } .fixed-content, .scroll-content { margin-top: 0!important; } .header-md::after, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="top"] > .tabbar::after, .footer-md::before, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="bottom"] > .tabbar::before { display: none; } ion-navbar { position: absolute; top: 0; } ion-header::before { background-image: url(); background-size: contain; background-position: center; display: block; height: 10vh; width: 45vw; content: ''; position: absolute; left: calc(50vw - 22.5vw); background-repeat: no-repeat; z-index: 1; bottom: 0px; } ion-title>div { opacity:0; } .menu-inner ion-header ion-toolbar { position: relative; } .menu-inner ion-header ion-title:after { height: 20px; } button.item ion-label { text-transform: uppercase; margin: 3vh 0; } button.item { padding: 0; } button.item .item-inner { padding: 0!important; background: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), transparent 30%); font-family: 'AvenirLT-Black'; } button.item .input-wrapper { text-align: center; font-size: 6vw; letter-spacing: 1px; font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; border-top: solid 3px #fff !important; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .toolbar-background { background: transparent!important; } .menu-inner { width: 100%!important; background: #fff!important; } .menu-inner ion-list ion-list-header { display: none; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(2) .item-inner { background: transparent; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(1) { display: none!important; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(2) { background: #e61eb5; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(3) { background: #c3fd2d; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(4) { background: #3935bd; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(5) { background: #fff89e; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(6) { background: #8f78fa; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(7) { background: #7fd6f2; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(8) { background: #e81fb9; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(9) { background: #c3fd2d; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(10) { background: #3a36bf; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(11) { background: #fff7b2; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(12) { background: #947bfb; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(13) { background: #7ad5f2; color: #201595; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(14) { background: #e920ba; } .menu-inner ion-list>button.item:nth-child(15) { background: #3A36BF; } .menu-inner ion-list { background: url(https://app.kingdomassociation.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/menuback.png) center/cover; margin: 0; } .menu-inner ion-content { background: #000!important; } .tab-button-text { text-transform: uppercase!important; font-size: 9px!important; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none!important; } .back-button .back-button-text { text-transform: uppercase!important; font-family: 'AvenirLT-Book'; } .toolbar button.activated, .tab-button { opacity: 1; } .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] ion-icon::before, .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] .tab-button-text { color: #766caa!important; } .tabs-md[tabsLayout=icon-hide] .tab-button, .tabs-md[tabsLayout=title-hide] .tab-button, .tabs-md .tab-button.icon-only, .tabs-md .tab-button.has-title-only { padding: 0 10px; border-top: solid 2px #fff !important; !IMPORTANT; } ion-icon { font-size: 35px !important; } .item-md ion-icon[item-left], .item-md ion-icon[item-right], .item-md ion-icon[item-start], .item-md ion-icon[item-end] { margin-left: 51px; margin-top: 11px; margin-bottom: 13px; /* border-top: solid 2px #fff !important; */ /* margin-top: -20px; */ height: 25px; float: right; margin-right: -109px; } /* X and XS */ @media only screen and (device-width : 375px) and (device-height : 812px) { ion-content.content { margin-top: 6vh!important; height: 94vh; } } /* XR and XS Max */ @media only screen and (device-width : 414px) and (device-height : 896px) { ion-content.content { margin-top: 6vh!important; height: 94vh; } } @media only screen and (min-width: 600px) { ion-content.content { margin-top: 10vh!important; height: 90vh; } ion-header::before { left: calc(50vw - 15vw); bottom: 80px; height: 9vh; width: 30vw; } }
